DOC.brief_summary: Individuals obesity particular type 2 diabetes abnormally high level fat liver cell increase risk cardiovascular liver-related mortality . Prior research show caloric restriction , exercise , behavior modification help lower hepatic fat level individual . Additional research also show exercise independent weight loss reduce hepatic fat content obese human . The current exercise guideline specify type intensity exercise require induce reduction hepatic fat . Thus , purpose study determine differential effect liver fat 4 wk high intensity intermittent exercise compare continuous moderate exercise obese individual .
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects complete liver spectroscopy scan ensure 5 % body fat . Subjects pass screen body composition measurement aerobic capacity ( VO2 peak ) measure . Blood sample also take subject complete oral glucose tolerance test . Upon completion test subject randomize one two group : Continuous moderate exercise group High-intensity interval exercise . Continuous moderate exercise group ( CME ) : Subjects perform 5-10 minute warm-up 50 % VO2peak . Thereafter , intensity exercise increase 70 % VO2peak increase speed incline treadmill . Subjects exercise intensity 60 minute . A 5 minute cool-down ( 50 % VO2peak ) . High-intensity interval exercise ( HIIE ) : Subjects perform 5-10 minute warm-up ( 50 % VO2peak ) . Following warm-up , speed incline treadmill increase subject reach exercise intensity correspond 90 % Heart Rate max . Subjects exercise intensity 4 minute , treadmill speed incline reduce intensity 55 % 70 % Heart Rate max 3 minute . This procedure replicate three additional time total four intervals/recovery period . The total exercise commitment ~45 minute . After 4 wk exercise training subject undergo initial testing .
DOC.criteria: Overweight obese body mass index 3045 kg/m2 . No known cardiovascular , kidney , liver disease . No extreme hypertension ( > 160 mm Hg systolic and/or > 100 mm Hg diastolic ) . Not treat exogenous insulin . No history surgery weight loss weight stable prior 3 month ( weight change < 3 kg ) . Nonexerciser ( < 20 minute exercise 2 day per week ) . Between 2160 yr age History alcohol use ( > 20 g/day male > 10 g/day female ) Kidney liver disease . Extreme hypertension > 160 mm Hg systolic and/or > 100 mm Hg diastolic . Waist measurement great 60 '' Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy scan less 5 % liver fat A history surgery weight loss . Exerciser ( > 20 minute exercise least 2 day per week ) Pregnant lactate < 21 > 60 yr age
